segmentosSRT.text: But my calligraphy's improving.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Long'er, you neglect your troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: My luck's changed.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Write that down. Another round.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
I'd heard you'd had a boy,
and were living at home.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: But I was too ashamed to see you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Let's put the past behind us...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
Chunsheng and I are lucky
to meet someone as nice as you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: You've looked after us.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Mother died without knowing where I was.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Pack a lunchbox. I'll wake him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing has to go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Wake up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: It was you who killed my son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: I had only one son, Chunsheng!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: At least it's loud enough for her to hear.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Sit with us for a bit.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Don't be like that.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng came to wish Fengxia well.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: You can't go on avoiding him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Can't we put this behind us?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: If only Youqing had been here today.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: I'll be going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
- But you won't stay?
- No, thanks.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Never mind. Let's go. Don't worry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: I'm just going to see him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: He's all right.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Why'd he do that?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text:
He's been locked up without food.
He scoffed those buns.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Drink it slowly.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Help us!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: She's bleeding! We don't know what to do.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Quick!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Little Bun...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: give me a hand.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Careful! Don't drop them!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Are you happy?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: He could have saved our Fengxia.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: He's a professor, after all.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: How about in here?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: This box is bigger, isn't it?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: They'll have more room to run around.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: Then they'll eat more.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: And soon they'll grow up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: the chickens will turn into geese...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: and the geese will turn into sheep...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: and the sheep will turn into oxen.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: he'll ride trains and planes...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14

segmentosSRT.text: and life will get better and better.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_14
